Hi all,

I need to send some emails programmatically inside my client app using HubSpot <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/email/transactional_email/single-send-overview?_ga=2.265880271.1167607153.1603096077-341660434.1601888010&_gac=1.204081444.1601889195.EAIaIQobChMIoofno9zc4AIVC7XACh20ZAWxEAAYASAAEgKOSfD_BwE|Single-Send API>. On the doc it mentions we need <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/how-to-use-transactional-email-in-HubSpot|Transactional addon> enabled in order to use this  API.

I don't believe my client which is a marketing starter account has it by default - but :

1. I couldn't confirm it (I do believe this should be one of the subscription type of the email option) - but not sure
2. How much would it cost to have this add on enabled ?
3. Are there any other alternatives to send HubSpot emails programmatically with a marketing starter account ? (I mean aside from enabling workflow which is an option too expensive for now) 
thanks in advance

Hey there, has anyone implemented an email modul personalisation based on a HubDB segmentation and contact  properties? Smart rules do not cover the complexity of the segmentation for our use case. Please can anyone help?
If you go under Account & Billing, it will list what is included in the account. You can find the add-on costs here: <https://legal.HubSpot.com/HubSpot-product-and-services-catalog>

Thanks <@UKGV272KS>

To sum up if I want to send an automated email when a property changes on one of my contact I can either :
• upgrade to HubSpot Sales/Marketing/Service Hub to enable worklfows (which I do believe offer this feature) cost of this option min : 300 $/month for the sales hub
• purchase the transactional email add on + dedicated IP : cost of 1000 $ /month
